problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB于点M,AM=2,OM=3．则CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, chord CD ⊥ AB at point M, AM = N_0, OM = N_1. Then the length of CD is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接OC,∵AM=2,OM=3,∴OA=5=OC,在Rt△OCM中,由勾股定理得:CM=√{5²-3²}=4,∵AB⊥CD,AB过O,∴由垂径定理得:CD=2CM=8,
raw_comment: 本题考查了垂径定理和勾股定理的应用,关键是构造直角三角形．
